concept.title: Example: Single ditavalref as a child of map
concept.shortdesc: Using ditavalref as a direct child of the map element is equivalent to setting global filtering conditions for that map.

example.p: The following map is equivalent to processing all the contents of the map with the conditions in the novice.ditaval file. If additional conditions are provided externally (for example, as a parameter to the publishing process), the global conditions take precedence.
